tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: As someone who has always had a phobia of visiting the dentist, I can't express enough how grateful I am to have found Dr. Geetanjali Marya. From the moment I walked in, her calming demeanor and genuine empathy immediately put me at ease. She took the time to understand my concerns and fears, addressing them with patience and compassion. Throughout the treatment, she continuously reassured me, making sure I was comfortable every step of the way. Her gentle approach and clear explanations made the experience surprisingly stress-free. Thanks to Dr. Marya's exceptional care, I no longer dread going to the dentist. If you're like me and have dental anxiety, I highly recommend seeing Dr. Marya. She's truly a lifesaver! Five stars without a doubt!

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I have been going to Dr. Geetanjali for all my dental problems since many years. I have been to other dentists before but was never fully satisfied with their work. Now since I have been going to Dr. Marya I am extremely satisfied whether it is for a root canal, getting a crown or even having a bridge made. She never makes me wait and is very thorough and gentle in her work. The clinic is very hygienic and clean. I would highly recommend Dr. Marya for All your dental care and treatment. I wish her all the success in life.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Geetanjali was amazing and explained the procedure in advance to make me feel comfortable. I highly recommend coming to her for any dental related issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Cosmetic/ Aesthetic Dentistry,Veneers / Laminates,Zirconia Crowns,Bleeding Gums Treatment,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,
review: It was an extremely complicated procedure that was handled very well. Dr. Geetanjali is superb at explaining and executing the procedure that took 6 sessions over a 3 week period. A fantastic experience all round - I could not be happier or more satisfied!
The doctor was calm and composed..explained me the issue and gave medications. I will re visit her in case my future dental issues occur.

review: My yellow teeth used to always be the reason of my low confidence.  After a friend's recommendation I visited a few dentists and liked the whole vibe at dr Maryas'.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: It was a very smooth experience.  Dr marya asked the issues I faced and gave her inputs after initial examination.  I loved the time and complete attention I was provided and most importantly everything was clean and hygienic.

Nice Doctors waiting for relief after that second visit because she told tooth cap wearing for one month
